Key Match Events: Spain defeated Albania 1-0 on June 24, 2024, with Torres scoring in the 13th minute.
Albania's Bajrami and Berisha received yellow cards in the 66th and 89th minutes respectively.
Spain's Vivian received a yellow card in the 90th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Albania forward Mirlind Daku was banned for two Euro 2024 games by UEFA for leading nationalist chants after a previous match against Croatia.
Albania needed to beat Spain to have a chance to advance to the knockout rounds.
